text:
Is your account sales or service enterprise?

Did you enroll in the beta? You can do this by going to the product updates tab and searching for "react"

Has anyone used the new Modal component yet? It appears there's a 400px max height applied and I can't work out how/if possible to get rid of it to display a full size image inside the modal. If anyone has any ideas would be eternally greatful :pray:
There is a beta for UI Extensions in a public HubSpot app? That would be huge for me and I am shocked that I missed this.
No current beta for public app react cards
Yeah, should be part of the private beta

I see what you mean:+1: The reason the component is designed like this is because its meant to display the progress for task management use cases especially and thats why any % above 100 doesn't work.

For now, I would say that the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-components/statistics|Statistics> component would be the best for showing a data point like this. I do understand that its not as visual. We have been discussing some kind of a line / bar chart component which might help solve your use case better. Would that be helpful? I can keep you informed on that if you'd like.
Has anyone created or know if someone has created a FIgma component library to wireframe custom cards?
